title: Fireside With The Underboss -  Butterflies For Big Paul
description: Not sure what to get Paul Castellano for Christmas after getting made, Sammy ends up with a unique and unforgettable gift.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Not sure what to get Paul Castellano for Christmas after getting made, Sammy ends up with a unique and unforgettable gift.
